---
applyTo: '**'
---

- Use config/api.js for API route configuration.
- Use services/apiClient.js for API client requests.
- Put pages in Pages/{pageName} and its components in Pages/{pageName}/{componentName}/.
- Put article pages in data/articles/{articleName} and its components in Articles/{articleName}/{componentName}/.
- Put portfolio pages in data/portfolios/{portfolioName} and its components in Portfolios/{portfolioName}/{componentName}/.
- Put global components in Components/.
- All pages should enable i18n support and put translation files in i18n/
